Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2021
Author: Mike
Title: Is this real?
Body: I am a Registered Nurse that recently treated a post surgical knee replacement patient.  My patient swore by these.  She made me look them up on Amazon.  She was not taking her ordered narcotic pain meds because she was taking these gummies.  I’ve seen acute and chronic pain (real pain).  I’ve worked in all hospital settings.  But, never do I see CBD prescriptions.  She was very convincing.I myself have back pain from herniated discs and foot pain from flat feet.  I bought some.  I take one gummy after dinner.My pain and leg stiffness has decreased, foot pain has decreased, and I sleep through the night.  How much a difference?  I think my pain levels went from a 7 to a 3 (maybe my pain levels will continue to get even better!).  My point, immediate results after 1 gummy.  It’s been 3 days now, 1 gummy a day.  I do not know long term results but as of now they have noticeably helped me with my pain, inflammation, lower back pain, sleep, and stress.  I did a little research but with more motivation and with a open mind.  I couldnt find anything negative about cbd oil.  There are so many benefits.  So I searched tolerance and addiction.  Have to find a down side to this too good to be true situation, right?  Again, all positive.  In  fact, tolerance is not a factor due to its chemical differences with how natural cbd oil “binds” to “pain receptors” compared to the way manufactured chemically made medications bind to pain receptors.  There is no tolerance or dependence.  The only real caution is buying from a reputable company that doesn’t include “junk” or THC in their product.  They do sell cbd oil with THC and that’s beneficial too but in different medical sub acute ways.  This brand is AMERICAN MADE, no THC, made in a FDA approved facility.  So far my experience is positive, almost to the point of complete surprise. It’s early but I think we’re gonna start to see cbd prescriptions as common as we see metoprolol.  Is this real, I say to myself?  Time will tell.  As of now, yes.  Thank you for your help.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
Author: Walter Prochorenko
Title: Where's the Hemp?
Body: According to the label, there does not appear to be any hemp at all in this product.  First of all the "Supplement Facts" ingredients does not mention any hemp. Also of the 7 ingredients listed 5 of the 7 show 0%.  0%% is "nothing"  so what is one paying for?  Secondly, the 9000 in bold numbers on the label also is misleading as it does not refer to anything at all. Is this a model number?  It certainly does not explain what this is.  Thirdly $34.95 for "candy" is a ridiculous price.  Another part of the label does show hemp oil extract, but does not indicate any quantity.  It could be just trace amounts, or just vapor.  This appears to be a complete falsehood.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020
Author: Memly
Title: Effective, Delicious, USA Made Gummies That Help Me Stay Asleep At Night and Wake Up Refreshed
Body: These are wonderful and I'm glad I found them.1. The price for two bottles is excellent2. Grown and made in the USA3. Strong and effective. I was taking two or more of a previous other brand but with these, I only need one to help me sleep through the night and wake up refreshed with zero grogginess4. Non habit forming. I take one almost everyday because I sleep great when I do. But I can take them... Or not. There are plenty of nights when I am naturally tired and don't need this. Or nights when I just forget4. Great taste and flavors. They are like delicious sour gummies. No weird aftertaste. I have to remind myself that I can only have one!5. Well packaged and lighting fast shipments from this company. I've ordered twice already and my gummies always arrive ahead of scheduleIf you are taking them to help you sleep like I am, note they take 1-2 hours to kick in. I take mine after dinner and have about a 2 hour window to wind down for bed. I shower, put my kids to bed, read or watch tv, then start to feel drowsy at just the right time.These are not like sleeping pills. They don't knock me out completely. I can power through if something comes up. I have never slept through alarms, phone calls, kids crying, emergencies, etc. I am able to wake up whenever I need to, whether I'm one hour into my sleep or 5 or more. I feel safe taking them and still be able to wake up and take care of my children. If my sleep is disturbed, I can actually fall back asleep more easily as well. This is great because I co-sleep with my 2 year old who is is constantly rolling around and kicking me in her sleep. I'll wake up, be able to check if she's ok, then I can go right back to sleep. So awesome!These do contain sugar. Each gummy is 10 calories.  I am going to try the gel capsules from this brand next, so I'm not ingesting sugars before bed.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
Author: peter wells
Title: Miraculous results so far.
Body: As someone who has suffered from insomnia for several years, I feel compelled to share my experience with this product. For me, it has been nothing short of miraculous. I take one gummy about a half hour before going to sleep I sleep through the night and most importantly I’ve been able to give up taking Ambien (zolpadem) which can have several serious side effects. Grateful.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2022
Author: Skylark Poems
Title: They work but.
Body: Contrary to what one reviewer who stated that it lists no hemp, the first ingredient is hemp oil. I can certify that they do work. But I need to take two gummies in the a.m. and two in the p.m. Each person has a different metabolism. I have been prescribed 300mg of Tylenol3 for my continuous pain. These worked well enough that I stopped taking the T3 for a few days, but the result was sharp pain at the worst time, bedtime. So these work as a top off to my T3, without them the T3 does not eliminate my pain. But without T3 these do not work for my level of pain. If what you are looking for is relaxation and nerve relief I can recommend these because they have worked for me. I gave a four star review because Of having looked in vain for a natural replacement for the T3 without success. However these are the best I have found after trying many CBD, and Hemp Gummies.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2020
Author: marpar
Title: not for me
Body: when they finally arrived the package had to be cut open, it was packed well but very tight. the gummies do not have as much hemp mg. as the ones I was taking. the bottle did not show the mg. it just does not work for me. i hoped it would work as the price was very good, too bad the gummy's were not. i did get a refund because i tried to cancel the order, they gave me a refund quickly but no way to send them back as the packing was cut.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2021
Author: Bob Richards
Title: A Godsend for the insomniac.
Body: I drank a quinzupple martini nightly to sleep for maybe 4.5 decades.Recently our youngest son gave me a few of these to try.  I was more than skeptical, since tranquilizers don’t even work.No exaggeration.  This has been life changing.  I’m 67, play BBall 3 times/week, and I’ve been at 250-270 most of my adult life.  I’m very tall with a big build, but no matter how you slice it, overweight. Knees are killing me.Well, these gummies are amazing.  Took one, and had to go to bed within an hour. I SLEPT!  Now, I don’t want to drink either.  Gummies seem to be rendered less effective with booze.  And, I Don’t need to drink.  Body ain’t what it used to be.Had my check up last week and weighed in at 232.I was sure the scale was fouled up, but no.  I’m now 228 and my wife is happy as heck; but also miffed cuz I’m losing faster than her.  She’s now making lots of great pasta dishes, devils food cake and homemade chocolate chip cookies trying to fatten me up.But it was the alcohol that kept me fat, not food.All that is true incidentally.  These things are awesome.  Wish they’d had them available long ago..  who’d of ever thought an old codger like me would finally lose weight with “rope gummies”.What a blessing.Bob

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
Author: Colossus
Title: Great Product but they changed the formulation
Body: I've been using this product for over a year to help me sleep.  I have a hard time falling asleep and staying asleep.  I take 2 gummies and it's the best sleep.  I fall asleep easily and will sleep straight through until morning every single night.My one and only complaint is the formulation was changed recently and I don't care for it.  The original formula was more of a gummy and had good flavors.  The new formula is more like a fruit chew and has more of a chemical taste.  I really hope they change back to the original formula because it's put me in the mindset to shop around for something else.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2021
Author: Valencia Whitehead
Title: Will Keep Using To See What Happens
Body: I was SO looking forward to these gummies after reading the positive reviews about better sleep, reduced pain and improved mood. On the positive side, I did not find them too tart or foul tasting at all. They tasted a bit like Sour Patch Kids (which I crave) but not as tangy, and I loved that they were so colorful.However, I dislike that there’s nothing to keep them from sticking together and clumping. Maybe I should have refrigerated them immediately. Didn’t see anything in the instructions so I’ve kept them on my desk and our air conditioner is almost always running to keep the house cool.To be fair, they state that the recommended dosage is 1-2 pieces. I’m a big, tall woman (5’ll and 245 lbs) so I took 3, the first day. I had a good night’s sleep and felt super optimistic, based on those results, so I took 3 again the following night, being careful not to exceed 4 pcs every six hours, per instructions. The results were not the same, unfortunately.As it relates to reducing discomfort, I suffer from neck, knee and back pain, neuropathy, depression and anxiety. The gummies appeared to help minimize my racing thoughts that first night and actually, I think it has helped very well with that, so I feel the product probably does “take the edge off” and provide the benefit of “mood support” as the claim suggests.My disappointment relates to the failure to address my aching and soreness.  Everything still hurts so much! I tried reducing the dosage to two, and felt I was no longer able to experience the mood benefits so I’m back to 3 pieces each night about two hours before bedtime. I’ll continue to use and will update if I experience any decreased pain!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
Author: Patricia Pearce
Title: i am amazed, you might be too.
Body: I have spent the last 10 years living with chronic pain in my knees, hips, and ankles.  I also suffered from insomnia.  there were more nights in the week when I didn't sleep at all than the nights where i got 4 hours before going to work.  My work was stressful by nature, and then i suffered the loss of my older child, my son, so needless to say stress and anxiety were through the roof, only complicating everything else.  I had been on all sorts of pharma for years and nothing helped me.  I just kept declining.  After a friend suggested I try these, my pain in nearly non-existent and my stress is gone.  I sleep soundly and the nightly nightmares are gone.  I wake up feeling refreshed, relaxed and ready to fact whatever comes my way.  the tremors are gone too along with 6 of the 9 prescriptions!  thank you New Age, your product has given me back my quality of life!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
Author: Lisa
Title: Sickly sweet taste. Why change?  .
Body: The new texture and flavor is awful. Sickly sweet. Yes, flavor and texture are important. Why did you change it? I can get this same overly sweet powerful acting product in a lot of places. I'm guessing the manufacturer changed. Thoroughly disappointed. I would have been a customer for life. Now, on to trying others.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
Author: WildNelly
Title: It works!
Body: I bought this for my parents (female: 58 and male: 61) My mom suffers from severe arthritis as she works inside and outside cleaning apartment buildings in the hot Florida sun. She’s always complaining about her body aches specifically inflammation around her arm, hands and knees. She was to the point of going to the emergency room because of the horrific pain. Needless to say, she took two gummies during the night around 7pm and the next morning the inflammation and pain had decreased. When my father took the same dosage, he fell asleep quicker. I asked him how it went for him and he said he was fine, but he takes a lot of medication as his had two back surgeries and is in constant pain. For them it works! For myself (female: 27) and only took one gummy, I sure slept like a baby. I hope it works for you.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
Author: Cait
Title: Good gummies but
Body: Okay, I have been using these gummies for sleep for maybe close to year now. I love them. They help with sleep and anxiety and I notice I sleep better when I take them.But, they changed the formula and im not a fan of the new ones. The older formula had a better taste and texture. This new formula taste off and the look is off as well. Not sure.  Hopefully they go back to the old formula

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
Author: Kay
Title: Works amazing !
Body: Love this product!! Great taste !  Does not get you a high feeling just very clam. Order these gummies every 3 months. If you live in warm climate the gummies might stick to each other. Very calming and smoothing feeling these gummies give you quick. Helps me fall asleep and with anxiety.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2022
Author: krisann67
Title: Worth It
Body: I have been using these gummies for about 6 months for sleep.  They definitely work!  I fall asleep fast and don't wake up until morning.  I have only had trouble in August of receiving them melted together in one giant glob.  However, nothing else works!  I pried the glob of gummies out of the bottle and pick a gummy sized piece off every night.  My husband I call it a gummy ball now.  I'll keep buying them.  Eventually it will be cold again and they will return to their normal gummy shapes in shipping.  That's the only reason I give it 4 stars.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2020
Author: loveiscakeloveiscake
Title: Tastes bad, works well.
Body: They work really well but taste like hemp. Take them at night or when you need a nap. They make you sleepy if you haven’t built a tolerance.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
Author: Meghan
Title: These are incredible!
Body: I have suffered with really bad lower back pain for years, also both shoulders to the point that I never get a good night's sleep but toss and turn constantly all night due to the pain. My doctors have said I have an inflammation issue. I was just recently getting over covid as was my father. My uncle had told him about these and gave him some to try and he ordered so for himself and gave me some to try. I didn't initially try it for the pain but to help me sleep due to the coughing. So I took 2 and went to bed, and not only did these help me to sleep soundly but my pain was like 90% gone! I dont care what I would take to knock me out my pain would still eventually wake me up and I would still have to keep moving and changing positions because of my pain. Even 2 naproxen didn't take my pain away like just 2 of these gummed did. I could not believe it but when you go from constant pain to almost none you will immediately see and feel a difference.I took 2 the next night, same results, had 1 left and wondered if 1 would still work, it did. I can't say if this will be something my body gets used to and will stop working but for now I have had the best sleep I have had in years. I would like to try it out on my hips walking because I have bad inflammation in both hips (I'm only 45 and pretty physically fit and active) if they make a difference with that I will be jumping for joy and will update on that. Right now I have only tried them at night and have only had them for less than a week but I am thrilled.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: They Raised the price
Body: My wife liked this product it seemed to help her a lot, but they doubled in price after a few short weeks so we moved on to another brand. There's too many brands out there to pay the price of these, so while I do like the product I can't recommend them because of that.I know times are tough but doubling the price is a sure fire way to lose business, it sure lost mine.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
Author: Mary Hovis
Title: Amazing !
Body: I have ordered these before, they are my best friend for sleepy time. Last time I ordered it was summer and they arrived all melted  together. They still worked,  I just had to cut them apart.  This time , they were shipped in an insulated envelope that kept them cool.They have really upped their shipping game! Way to go!That being said... this product is amazing! I use 2 before getting in bed and I am out like a light within 10 minutes. Much better than melatonin which is hit or miss with me. It also helps with my restless legs.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
Author: AnnaAnna
Title: One bottle arrived melted into one blob, gummies in other bottle taste horrible
Body: I am so disappointed with these after reading the reviews. One bottle arrived melted into one blob, and I'm not sure if the other one is expired because they just taste gross. Giant waste of money.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
Author: Carol B. Sims
Title: It helps me to relax, not go to sleep, just relax.
Body: As stated above, It does help me to relax.  Very useful for an elderly lady who has never smoked "weed", "pot."

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
Author: CalledMoo
Title: Better then most CMD Gummies
Body: Overall the taste of these are overall much better then most other CMD gummies and are affective. However you will get one bear every so often that has a much stronger hemp taste then the others. Have not felt any different on those days but possibly something to keep in mind incase it is a quality issue within their mixing process.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
Author: MOTLEY
Title: These hemp gummies can give you your life back.
Body: As a stand up forklift driver of 20 years the everyday abuse from all the absorbed impacts from the forkliftreally started to take a toll on my knees and legs,  since the driver absorbs all the bumps and impacts of the floors and terrain of going in and out of trucks. I found these New Age hemp gummies at a Retail Rebel store and had to try them since my joint pain had become unbearable. I took the gummies the night before I went back to work. The next morning I woke up without a bit of pain in my knees or legs. These gummies worked a miracle for my knees and legs. I can't go without them and now have a repeated  delivery schedule through Amazon. Of course each individual will have to find thier correct dosage for these gummies,  but for me I can't thank New Age for making them enough. These gummies gave me my life back, one of being happy and pain free.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
Author: Brooke
Title: Helps me sleep so much better
Body: I work night shift, so these things have been an absolute life saver. They taste great. And the only time I actually sleep hard without tossing and turning and waking up is when I take about 3 of these gummies. I’ve repurchased several times. Highly recommend to those who have trouble getting to sleep or trouble staying asleep!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
Author: KLStauffer
Title: My Blood pressure dropped after using ONE Gummie; hence, I will take with caution!
Body: I am using with caution after my initial episode.  This Gummie is from a different company, so I will have to use with caution and hesitancy!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
Author: Bluesky5553
Title: I really wanted these to work......but..
Body: I was hoping to get some slight pain relief and to be able to sleep better. It's a very nice, expensive sweet and tart candy, but that's about all.  I am not getting any relief from pain that I hoped for, and it sure doesn't help me sleep any better. From what I have learned so far, there is a major difference in CBD comparing what's in these to what you can get elsewhere.I can not honestly recommend these to anyone at this point.  I am very disappointed to say the least.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2021
Author: Denise Connors
Title: Best sleep in years
Body: So I don’t usually take anything but Ibuprofen for minor backache in the am/pm & nothing for my crappy sleep. I thought I’d try it for the hell of it & was completely surprised! I have taken one a night before bed & I fall asleep faster, get back to sleep faster after I use the bathroom & wake up feeling like I REALLY slept! I stopped taking the Ibuprofen before bed & in the am because my dull backpain is gone. They are a tad sour, but not real bad & easily to chew & desolve. I am glad I got the 2 pack as I think these will be my nightly thing now.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
Author: JTJT
Title: Dear Seller: Great product - but this time they sent me SOUR instead (not the kind that I ordered)
Body: Dear Seller: This product works great! Especially to use as an aide to help me get rest at night. Just one gummy will do the trick at this strength. This is my 3rd or 4th time ordering from this seller. I keep ordering from you because of the awesome product that works well! I also love the super fast delivery of the SAME DAY DELIVERY provided by Amazon. I would give it 10 star rating if it were possible.However, when I reorder it last night (by using the option “order this again”), they sent me the wrong one. They sent me “sour” this time, which is NOT what I ordered.The bottle on top of the box is the one I usually receive (the normal flavor). The 2 on the side of the box in the photo, are the ones that just arrived in the “sour” labeled box.Here is another way you can tell the difference:As you can see in the photo, all 3 bottles look the same - they don’t say sour on the bottle, but it only says sour on the box. The sour ones (bottles on the left and right of the photo) are a different color and have a lot more sugar on them, than the bottle on top of the box.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
Author: P. HortonP. Horton
Title: Deliciously soothing!
Body: Great flavors! Excellant packaging! These Bears are better than ‘counting sheep’ come sleep time! Three bears, and I am sleeping like a baby! They calm, sooth and even help with my rheumatoid arthritis! You must try these!

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
Author: D Vuke
Title: Night time chill helper
Body: Take when restless or a bit insomniatic, or achy body, tends to take the edge off and allow me to relax. But I find when taking I get up much earlier than usual.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
Author: Wendy A. Emlinger
Title: Sadly, gummies and summer shipping during heat waves don't mix.
Body: Just thought I'd warn others who'd like to order these gummies to avoid doing so in the summer. UPS trucks aren't air-conditioned and they got so hot during transport that they melted in the bottles. They were very colorful and very solidly merged. I had to toss them.The good news is the company refunded my money and that was very decent of them.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
Author: Big AL
Title: Very strong! Good!
Body: Let's get rid of the sugar, corn syrup, artificial flavors and colors. This is not candy for kids! Please flavor with real lime/lemon and better sweeteners. Then fives stars

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
Author: Becky Williams
Title: Last batch tasted terrible.  Hope it was just a fluke..
Body: the new recipe is terrible.  I will order one more time, and if they taste as bad as this last batch, I'll find another company to deal with.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I've been taking these for a while
Body: I've been taking these for a few years now, they do help lessen pain and help me to rest.  The most recent batch I received has been changed a bit.  They are harder and the flavor is a little off.  I liked the ones I had received in the past better.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
Author: Lou
Title: What am I ingesting?
Body: I wanted to echo the sentiments of another reviewer. What the heck am I ingesting? There is almost no useful information on the label. I can do math, so, 90,000 MG divided by 90 gummies in the package is 100 MG per piece. 100 MG of what exactly? It doesn't say. How does Amazon partner with a company that manufactures something that is ingested with no information on the label about what it is. "Ingredients: Hemp oil..." is inadequate.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
Author: Jefferson Steelflex
Title: THEY USED TO BE STRONGER!!!!
Body: I originally purchased these gummies in January of 2021. At the time, the gummies had a very strong oil flavor and each color didn’t really have too much of a different taste. The flavor was a very potent oil sour flavor that if you ate after brushing your teeth was almost unbearable due to the sourness. HOWEVER 2 of those bad boys and by the time your close your eyes it’ll be morning. I believe while they were strong, eating them before brushing your teeth was nothing unbearable and definitely able to eat although you could taste the oil and potency. Fast forward to now after finally finishing the 2 bottles, I decided to purchase again since I was satisfied last time however I noticed the recipe changed. The gummies now each have a significant blast of flavor and do not taste very potent at all. I wouldn’t be surprised if this had 0 CBD or hemp oil in it. These now literally taste like sour gummy worms you would find at the store. I don’t know if it’s in my head but they don’t feel as strong and you need at least 4-5 to even feel like they might help you sleep although these are only inducers and it isn’t really responsible for literally making you fall asleep it just should make you sleep faster. I will say I felt less groggy in the morning and woke up with more energy but I really do miss the old formula and definitely feel like these are no where near as strong as the previous ones.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
Author: Dana C.
Title: Changed recipe.
Body: Don’t like the new flavors. Don’t know if they contain the same products but I don’t care for the new taste.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
Author: James Braaten
Title: Vivid Dreams
Body: I've incorporated the NEW AGE Naturals Advanced Hemp Gummies into my nightly routine, and they've been quite the experience. These gummies have a great taste, making it a treat to have before bed. After taking 3 each night, I've noticed they assist in helping me sleep and often lead to vivid dreams. However, a word of caution: consuming more than 3 can intensify the dreams to an unsettling degree.While I hoped they might help with pain relief, I didn't observe any such benefits. But for those, like me, who are primarily seeking a sleep aid with the added perk of vivid dreaming, these gummies might just be what you're looking for. Just remember to stick to 3 or fewer for the best results.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2022
Author: Amazon CustomerAmazon Customer
Title: Melted gummies.
Body: I’ve always ordered new aged gummies and never had any issues until this time. Both jars of my gummies are completely melted together! I’ve ordered this product before in the summer and this has NEVER happened before. I’m a bit disappointed this time around esp since these gummies help me with my anxiety a lot.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2022
Author: Carol J. Smith
Title: Not as effective as the New Age Premium Hemp Gummies for me
Body: I've used the New Age Premium Hemp Gummies (50 mg of hemp oil extract in each gummie) for some time and they have been wonderful for sleep and very helpful for reducing anxiety.  Recently I bought the New Age Advanced Hemp Gummies from Amazon instead of the Premium Hemp Gummies, and after using them I find them less effective for sleep and totally ineffective for reducing anxiety.  In addition, I found that the bottles of Advanced Hemp Gummies list NO information about the number of mg of hemp oil extract in each gummies, unlike the Premium Hemp Gummies, which specify that each gummie contains 50 mg of help oil extract.  That means that the Advanced gummies may contain less hemp oil than the Premium gummies do, which could account for why they are less effective for me than the Premium gummies are. Amazon shouldn't allow gummies to be sold on their web site without ensuring that the exact number of mg of hemp oil in each gummie is specified on the bottle or packaging.
